int Jack::JackPort::RequestMonitor ( bool  onoff  ) 

jackd.h If JackPortCanMonitor is set for this port, turn input monitoring on or off. Otherwise, do nothing.

if (!(fFlags & JackPortCanMonitor)) return -1;
